forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 20 mph.

weather_report:
The evening air in Downtown San Francisco is serene, marked by a gentle clarity that hints of the coolness to come, as the city transitions into a mostly clear night kissed by mild temperatures around 52 degrees. The west-southwest winds are whispering softly, guiding your senses to the understated elegance of the twilight skyline, without a hint of fog obscuring the panorama. As you glance toward the Golden Gate, expect the familiar spectacle of lights illuminating the pathways, inviting evening strolls along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet dinner at an outdoor café, where the city’s pulse feels just right.

Tomorrow promises a continuation of this picturesque weather. Daybreak will reveal a sun that brightens the horizon, reaching a high near 67 before the afternoon takes a slight plunge to the mid-60s. The southwest breeze, invigorating yet gentle at 5 to 20 mph, will caress you throughout the day. With such delightful conditions, dressing in layers becomes the sentiment of choice – a light jacket to accompany your morning coffee, perhaps a cozy sweater for your afternoon adventure. This midweek pause in the bustle lends itself well to leisurely explorations: consider a leisurely stroll through a neighborhood market or a quiet read in one of the city’s lovely parks, absorbing the tranquil blend of urban life and nature that makes San Francisco so enchanting.
